sentences.en: A notice had been pasted to the door.
sentences.cn: 一张告示被贴在了门上。

sentences.en: Add tomato paste, salt and pepper to taste.
sentences.cn: 酌量添加番茄酱、盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.en: Apply the wallpaper paste with a roller.
sentences.cn: 用滚子来涂墙纸的糨糊.

sentences.en: Blend a little milk with the custard powder to form a paste.
sentences.cn: 往蛋奶沙司粉里加入一点儿牛奶，搅成糊糊。

sentences.en: Blend the cornflour to a smooth paste with a little cold water.
sentences.cn: 加入少量的凉水，将玉米粉搅拌成均匀的糊状。

sentences.en: Blend the flour with the milk to make a smooth paste.
sentences.cn: 把面粉和牛奶调成均匀的面糊。

sentences.en: Combine the flour with 3 tablespoons water to make a paste.
sentences.cn: 往面粉里加3大勺水揉成面团。

sentences.en: Data can be pasted into word processing documents.
sentences.cn: 数据可以粘贴到文字处理文件中。

sentences.en: Don't make the paste too thick, or it will not spread evenly.
sentences.cn: 不要把酱弄得太稠, 否则不易涂均匀.

sentences.en: Make deep slashes in the meat and push in the spice paste.
sentences.cn: 在肉上切出深深的口子，再把辣酱塞进切口中。

sentences.en: meat/fish/tomato etc paste
sentences.cn: 肉酱/鱼酱/番茄酱等

sentences.en: Mix the powder with enough water to make a smooth paste.
sentences.cn: 把粉末和足够的水混合调成均匀的糊状。

sentences.en: Please paste these sheets of paper together.
sentences.cn: 请将这几张纸粘在一起.

sentences.en: She mixed the flour and water to a paste.
sentences.cn: 她用水和面做成面团.

sentences.en: She mixed the flour and water to a smooth paste.
sentences.cn: 她把面和水和成细润的面团。

sentences.en: This paste stirs easily.
sentences.cn: 这种糨糊易于搅拌.

sentences.en: Use some paste to join the broken ends.
sentences.cn: 用点糨糊把断头接起来.

sentences.en: Using a whisk, mix the yolks and sugar to a smooth paste.
sentences.cn: 用打蛋器将蛋黄和糖打成均匀的糊状。

sentences.en: wallpaper paste
sentences.cn: 贴墙纸的糨糊

sentences.en: Whip the ingredients into a smooth paste.
sentences.cn: 把配料搅拌成均匀的糊状.

phrases.tran_cn: 蕃茄酱，西红柿酱；蕃茄糊

trans.tran_cn: 面团，糨糊，肉（或鱼等）酱（作涂抹料或烹饪用），（制作人造宝石的）铅质玻璃
trans.tran_en: a soft thick mixture that can easily be shaped or spread
to make words that you have removed or copied appear in a new place on a computer screen
to stick something to something else using glue
